title: The Real Daughter, She Is an Almighty Boss
summary: A highly skilled fighter wakes up in someone else's body and discovers that she's the Huffmans' lost daughter Gemma, regarded as socially inferior to her adoptive sister and a human punching bag for her Aunt Elodie. Her father doesn't care about her. Her mother is ashamed of her. Just when everyone thinks Gemma is going to make a complete fool of herself, they get a slap in the face.

title: Genius of the Unique Lineage
summary: Earth had been invaded by creatures from another dimension, and it has been a few years since peace was restored, thanks to the help of various supernatural humans that revealed themselves during this invasion. Gwangik Yu, our protagonist, was born between two supernatural parents. His father is an immortal while his mother is a transformer with exceptional physical abilities along with the power to transform into beasts. Neither parent, however, is aware of each spouse’s power and both want Gwangik to follow in their footsteps.

title: Trash of the Count’s Family
summary:
Kim Roksu has one life motto: “Let’s not get beat up.”

But after dozing off somewhere midway through the novel “Birth of a Hero,” he wakes up as Cale Henituse - one of the minor villains in the novel who gets the beating of a lifetime from soon-to-be hero Choi Han.

Only time will tell how much longer he has before that dreadful encounter. Can Kim Roksu change the course of this story so he can enjoy a long and lavish life free of the soon-to-be hero?

title: The Princess Who Lost Everything Waits for Her Knight
Even though I become a side character, I’m being adored by an overprotective duke
summary:
*I was reincarnated as a mob character from an otome game, and my fiancé is a handsome duke.*

I've been transmigrated as "Leticia," a mob character from an otome game. I was forced to take Lionel as my fiancé by my twin sister (who, by the way, has the worst personality). The first time I met Lionel, he was nothing but chubby and fat, just as the rumours said he'd be… However, me being me, I realised that Lionel is an unpolished gem with potential to shine, so I decided to re-invent him. Even if I'm a mob character, my days of doting on my fiancé began when my fiancé transformed both inside and out.

---
*I was reborn... as a background character in a romance game?! And my fiancé is a hot duke?!*

Reincarnated as 'Leticia,' a background character in a game, I found out that my twin sister, who has a horrible personality, pawned her fiancé, Lionel, off on me. When I first met Lionel, he was just as chubby as I'd heard... But I soon realized he was a diamond in the rough and decided to make him shine!

But that's when I discovered that my newly hot fiancé is acting like he's head over heels for me...!

title: The Stray Cat Who Doesn’t Know the Greatest Love Song
Describe Your Feeling When Being Reincarnated as Your Husband’s Mistress
summary: Adrienne Trovica, the sole Grand Duchess of the Rhonta Empire, suddenly dies from a seizure and wakes up in the body of Countess Bleiah Acacia, who looks exactly like her. As it turns out, Bleiah is no ordinary woman. She was the mistress of Adrienne’s loving husband, Noevian Trovica. Adrienne, shocked by the news, attends her funeral as Bleiah to confirm the rumor. To her surprise, she sees a man crying for her at her grave. Who is this mystery man, and was everything that she knew about her husband a lie?

title: Roots of the Heart
summary:
Robot is an all-color manga compilation compiled and edited by the elite manga artist Range Murata, character designer for Studio Gonzo's Last Exile and Blue Submarine No. 6. Murata's hand-picked contributors come together in a mind blowing experiment of what happens when top manga artists work in the unusual medium of color.  
  
Robot was partially published in English, the first three volumes by Digital Manga Publishing from September 19, 2005 to December 1, 2006, after which the license was taken over by Udon Entertainment, who published volumes 4 and 5 from December 1, 2007 to May 1, 2008, before they too dropped the license. It has been published in its entirety in French by Glénat.

title: Dungeon Crawler Carl
summary: You know what’s worse than breaking up with your girlfriend? Getting stuck on a sadistic alien gameshow with her cat. Join Carl and Princess Donut as they try to survive the end of the world — or just get to the next level of a trap-filled fantasy dungeon.

title: Who Kidnapped the Empress?
summary: He is the Demon King who was impeached. She is the brave hero who was laid off because of a failed expedition. Bound by destiny, the two of them embark on an adventure to repay their debts.

title: Close and Secretive
summary: On that day, I was going to confess to you. Choi Ji-young, an unidentified woman who accidentally encountered her on Ulleungdo Island. Sunwoo Hyun keeps bothering Ji-young. Two people who are attracted to each other even in a short period of time. Then one day, Ji-young suddenly disappears. Without a trace. “It’s been a while, Hyun. Aren’t you going to say hello?” Ji-young, who could not be found no matter how much she visited, became the “Choi Ji-an” and appeared in four years. That’s also for Hyun to protect. “With this time, there is no Choi Ji-young I knew. So, just delete it too.”

title: The Empress’s Beast Selection
summary:
A collection of older oneshots that are also collected in other collections.

Volume 1:
1. "Sunde ni Touch!" in "Imadoki" Vol. 5
2. "Couple" in "Shishunki Miman Okotowari Kanketsu Hen"
3. "Hatsuki Triangle" in "Suna no Tiara"
4. "Houkago Gensou" in "Appare Jipangu" Vol. 1
5. "700 Nichi no Blue" in "Suna no Tiara"

Volume 2:

6. "Perfect Lovers" in "Musubiya Nanako"
7. "Otomoe no jijou" in "Shishuki Miman Okotowari" Vol. 3
8. "Genseika" in "Mint de Kiss me"
9. "Mint de Kiss Me" in "Mint de Kiss Me"
10. "Pajama de Ojama" in "Gomen Asobase!"
11. "Pajama de Meiro" in "Gomen Asobase!"

title: Reincarnated Escort Warrior
summary: Although an old porter has shown great determination and loyalty to his escort agency, he is never given the chance to become an armed escort due to his bad leg. But after sacrificing his life to keep a priceless treasure from a group of bandits, he is reborn as the 22-year-old Li Zhenglong who died 30 years ago! Now, in the body of the fourth young master of the Heavenly Dragon Escort Agency, will he finally realize his dream? Or will Li Zhenglong's terrible reputation ruin it all?

title: Overtime Elite
summary:
Omari’s dream was always to become a professional basketball player.
But that dream was quickly crushed by reality.
There’s school, money, his strict aunt, and the future, of which he wasn’t sure of until a mysterious scout discovers his talent with a ball and offers him a ticket to Overtime Elite Academy, a high-tech program designed to craft the world's greatest basketball player.
Does Omari have what it takes to survive against the most competitive basketball talent?
Or will his dream slip away again?

(Source: Webtoon)

title: Potion Witch
summary:
"I want you to make me a love potion."

The “Witch of the Lake” had her heart broken when the object of her one-sided affection requested that she make him a love potion.

If that’s the case, then I wish to spend more time with him, even if it’s just up until the preparations for the love potion are complete. That was what I had told myself, and yet…

The romantic tale of a reclusive witch and a solemn knight that begins from unrequited love.

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://crossinfworld.com/Hello-I-am-a-Witch-and-my-Crush-Wants-me-to-Make-a-Love-Potion.html)

title: Return of the Runebound Professor
summary:
Magus Vermil was a scumbag — the most hated professor at a magic academy. Then someone murdered him. He never would have been heard from again if not for a lost soul from Earth by the name of Noah Vines. 

Transmigrated into Vermil’s body, Noah assumes the man’s runic powers and extensive list of enemies. There’s just one problem. Noah has to teach class tomorrow, and he has no damn idea what magic is.

title: Goblins Night
summary:
“The complex of the boy, Choi Si-woo, is being overweight. Choi Si-woo runs and runs around his house until past midnight, and he encounters an old man on a walking trail. In the blink of an eye, the old man covers Choi Si-woo with the straw backpack he is carrying. Where Choi Si-woo had stumbled upon was an enormously wide ruined traditional Korean house (hanok).

At the edge of the spacious courtyard, surrounding him on the courtyard, there were numerous black shadows standing. To the bewildered Choi Si-woo, the old man speaks. Once every 666 years, a ceremony is held to select the king of Yokai and each Yokai in this world possesses one entry ticket for it. And Choi Si-woo is, in fact, a hybrid of a human and a goblin, inheriting the blood of an extinct goblin. Among the goblin folk, only Choi Si-woo possesses the entry ticket. As the sole survivor inheriting the blood of a goblin, the adventure of the half-monster boy, Choi Si-woo, begins.”

title: Regressor’s Life After Retirement
summary:
After two decades of battling extradimensional monsters and protecting the world, Lim Dae-in is finally ready to retire and enjoy a peaceful life. However, the morning after his retirement party, he wakes up to find himself back in time… before he even gained his powers. 

Armed with knowledge of the future, Dae-in is determined to secure his fortune and retire again, but this time within three years.

title: Medical Top Surgeon
summary:
**The Key to Surgical Success: Seongil Seoul Hospital is the ultimate battleground.**

Surgical specialist Jinwon Yoo receives a covert request for surgery from Wooje Seong, the chairman of South Korea’s largest conglomerate, **Seongil Group**.

At last, the chance for revenge has arrived!

Can Jinwon Yoo, armed with nothing but a scalpel, surpass Seongil Seoul Hospital and seize control of the Seongil Group?  
A fight everyone thought was impossible is about to begin.

title: Tiger Cub
summary:
The kid next door came back as an adult. What he is aiming for.. is my ♡♡..?!

Choi In-ho, the kid next door who took care of him when he was young, appears in the basement of this ordinary office worker. Due to In-ho's fraud (?), he suddenly ends up living in the basement.

Inho, who has been in love with the kid since his childhood, tries to seduce him, but fails once and for all..

What do we do to flirt with this dull brother?!

title: Gold Queen
summary: I'm Teru! Just your wee lil' horny high school girl who's trying to become a mangaka! One day, while I was lost in my sexual fantasies, I got hit by a truck and was reincarnated into an isekai! Though I became a slave of the beautiful elf queen, Sirius, I've got a wholesome orc as my roommate, and there's cute elves all around, so I have to say I'm having a pretty time!

title: The Cruelty of Salvation
summary:
Nishioka Kyoudai's anti-war epic, told in their signature surrealist style.   
  
A man wakes up one morning to find the world outside of his house a wasteland. As he searches for signs of life, he finds a fetus in a ditch, which promptly latches onto his thumb and won't let go, and things only get stranger from there…

title: The Handmaiden Hates Childcare
summary: No summary available.

title: Pet the Little Princess
summary: This is a story about: a female lead who transforms into a child after losing her virginity, her identity switches between an adult and a kid. With the crown prince who has a dual personality too, there's equal parts love and bite.

title: Kindergarten Superpower Diaries
summary:
In a world where superpowers are part of everyday life, even kindergarten isn’t normal.
Oh Sae-ong, a substitute teacher with no powers, no experience, and barely any stamina,
finds himself assigned to a class full of toddlers who can summon fire, control water, and even glimpse the future. Outmatched and overwhelmed, he fumbles through each chaotic day—learning, growing, and gradually connecting with these extraordinary little beings. Because in a place where everyone is special, sometimes the most ordinary heart can make the biggest difference. A heartwarming and chaotic slice-of-life story about powers, patience, and the magic of growing up.

title: Magic Emperor
summary:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)

title: I Awoke as a God After Auto Battling For a Million Years
summary: An otherworldly invasion begins as countless monsters pour through rifts, engulfing human cities and plunging humanity into a doomsday crisis! From this point, humanity enters an era of universal job transfers, with nations vying to train powerful professionals and compete for top rankings in the otherworldly conquest! When the number one ruler of the Dragon Kingdom, who has slumbered for millions of years, awakens with millions of years' worth of idle resources, the bosses of the otherworld tremble. Top-tier professionals from countries around the globe kneel in awe...

title: That’s Just How First Love Is, Your Highness
summary: When a love-cursed prince becomes obsessed with a majestic black cat, he "adopts" its intimidating owner—a woman who scares alleyways just by glaring. But as her sharp tongue and mysterious past unravel, he discovers the real magic isn’t the cat... but the fierce woman who refuses to be charmed.

title: I randomly have a new career every week
summary: After being fired from his company, Lin Yi accidentally gets the All-Pro Experience System. Lin Yi relies on the various career arrangements and generous rewards given by the system to achieve his ambition and path to wealth step by step, becoming the ultimate all-powerful big brother who dominates the world.

title: Number One Beast Master
summary: A global anomaly has occurred, and monsters have invaded. Monster trainers now bear the burden of saving human civilization. After Xiao Xingyu crosses over, he awakens the “God-tier Monster Training System”. By opening the Eye of the Demonic God, he can see through all hidden evolution paths of monsters, activate their hidden bloodlines, and unlock infinite evolution… A husky can evolve into the Hellhound! A fairy can mutate into the Twelve-Winged Blazing Angel! Hatching a dragon egg can summon the Nine-Spirited Candle Dragon!”

title: One Hundred Thousand Years of Tribulation by Heavenly Thunder
summary:
After transmigrating into a cultivation world, young Fang Lingxiao rises to greatness with a talent that defies the heavens. In just a hundred years, he reaches the peak—the Great Ascension Stage. But during his final tribulation, the heavens unleash something unimaginable: a lightning storm that rages not for days or months, but for a hundred thousand years.

When he finally emerges from the ordeal, his cultivation is shattered—reduced to that of a mere mortal. Yet, his body, forged by countless years under divine lightning, has become indestructible.

Soon, Fang Lingxiao realizes the truth—this wasn’t fate. It was sabotage from a powerful figure in the Upper Realm.

Now, with his cultivation lost but an unbreakable body as his weapon, he sets out on a path of vengeance. He’ll uncover the traitor, climb the heavens once more, and make them all pay.

title: Hades & Persephone
summary: This series including fanfic short stories about the famous couple in Greek mythology- Hades and Persephone and some other couples as well.

title: Seoul Exorcism Department
summary: No summary available.

title: The Second Eunuch Regains His Manhood
summary:
[By Force & LICO studio that brought you <Return of Mount Hua Sect> and <Chronicles of the Demon Faction>,  and many more!

The eunuch Lee Cheolsu, a secret power figure who controls the affairs of the empire at will. He possesses absolute power, wealth, and even strong martial arts skills… but what does that mean? If he can’t “do that”!!
Through a reincarnation technique, Cheolsu returns to the time before he became a eunuch. He has one goal in mind: to become an alpha male and enjoy life with the most beautiful women!!
A full-fledged 15+ rated(?) comic martial arts story about Cheolsu, who lives purely for his desires, begins!

title: I Need Someone to Stop My Older Brothers
summary:
I only went to calm the disturbance in front of my house, but the one I encountered was the Demon King that I punished, and unfortunately, I was falsely accused of being the demon king and died in the hand of the subjugation team.

‘I’ll kick your ass, Pamel Asinov! I’ll make you shed tears from both of your eyes!’

Among them, the worst one was the hero, Pamel Asinov, who drove me to death as a Demon King!

But when I pleaded to take revenge, I opened my eyes, 500 years later! Pamel’s been dead for a long time, and the ‘brothers’ who came one day…

“Purple eyes. It’s not a color that anyone can have.”
“But I was like this from the beginning.”
“Yes, you were. Because you are the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov.”
“…the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov?”

Of all people, I’m the daughter of ‘that’ Asinov? It’s nice to live a peaceful life, but I was born an enemy’s blood!

‘All the brothers in this house have a habit of hugging people.’

This shitty family. I have to hate them, but why do I keep getting attached to them?

title: Whispers of the Devil
summary:
He killed the heroes, killed the king, the devil beast then found the "baby of fate"...

Having both superior intellect and destructive power, such is Clevatess, the devil beast king. Angered by the 13 heroes' attempt to take his life, he had decided to bring ruin upon humanity, but he gets entrusted with an unexpected nuisance: a newborn human baby. Is this the tale of a world close to apocalypse or a diary of new-era childcare?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [LINE Manga](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000841)

title: I Didn’t Lull You to Sleep Only For You to Be Obsessed
summary:
The protagonist finds herself possessing the body of April, a side character destined to be used by the villain and eventually killed by the male lead. Ignoring the original plot, she resolves to live a quiet life running a café in the countryside.

However, her plans begin to unravel when she discovers that the boy she’s been caring for is actually the nephew the male lead has been desperately searching for.

April ends up becoming the male lead’s personal barista, brewing magical coffee for him every night, and eventually running a café in the capital. She tells herself it’s only until the female lead appears, but as she slowly opens up to the male lead, she finds herself becoming more and more entangled in a life by his side.

title: She Wasn’t My Daugther
summary: After ten years of chopping firewood (so tired ಠ╭╮ಠ), female immortals (one after another ╮(￣⊿￣)╭) knelt down and begged me to take them as my disciples! _(´ཀ`」 ∠)_

title: To Julie
summary: Julia Green is a teenager who lives in California alone. When she was feeling her loneliest, she unexpectedly encounters an unknown yet strikingly beautiful boy in her closet. Following that incident, whenever she was going through a rough time, William magically appears in her closet. For example, when she spent her birthday alone, on the night of a dance party she has to go to unaccompanied, or having to spend a sad dawn, he appears. Julia naturally ends up falling for William, who stood by her side in every tough moment... A magical love story that transcends time and space, where they have to fight to stand by each other.

title: The Genius Mage Who Uses His Fists
summary:
Zed, a former MMA champion, wakes up in the body of a scrawny prisoner in a fantasy world. Reborn as a member of the once-feared Arahan family, he’s trapped inside a brutal magical internment camp. With no spells at his disposal, Zed trains his body to become a living weapon. He escapes the prison with his only ally Riu, a sharp-witted inmate. Now hunted by both a ruthless warden and a noble house, Zed must fight his way to freedom only with his fists. Can a man with no magic change the rules of a world built on it?   

---

**Original Webtoon:**   
- [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=836657)
- [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=12255262)   

**Official Translations:**   
- [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/action/the-fistfighting-genius-mage/list?title_no=8018)
- [T.Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/the-fistfighting-genius-mage/list?title_no=8220)

title: My Dad Is Too Strong
summary:
What? My elder sister, who is lazy, charming, and abusive, is not born of the same parents as me? What? She wants to be a Superstar, but fortunately, I have a system and a cheat. Help remove all obstacles in her way! What? My parents asked me to help solve her single status problem, but I’m still single! Why don’t you guys care for me? ! The system said: I think the two of you are quite suitable, and I will match you guys up. I won’t do it, As a brother, I will protest against it!

---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30704)
- [Alternative Raw (IQIYI)](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_1hjftkhw59x.html)
- [Alternative English (HoneyToon)](https://honeytoon.com/comic/my-sister-is-a-big-star)

title: The Bottom-Feeder Scavenger’s Revenge
summary:
After his sister's death, Row, who was said to be a freeloader, becomes an explorer to investigate the cause of his sister's death. 

When he nearly loses his life in the dungeon, he acquires the ability to disassemble monster corpses, supplies, and skills. Row becomes stronger by disassembling various things. 

And the mystery of his sister's death slowly begins to unravel...

title: After Reincarnation, My Enemy Made Me Invincible with Money
summary: In the apocalyptic era, my sisters and I struggled to survive, but in the eyes of the rich and powerful, we were nothing more than ants. Just before I died, I awakened a special ability to be reincarnated. I was reborn directly into the family of my greatest enemy. Now, I will make them pour all of their resources into raising me, only so I can become their ultimate destruction!

title: Reincarnated as a Scumbag, I Use My Wife and Daughter to Prove Immortality
summary: A mighty Da Luo immortal, gravely wounded, descends to the mortal world and reincarnates into the body of the scumbag Jiang Tianchen. After a thousand years of being single, he encounters a gang trying to assault his wife and take his daughter — so he beats them down without mercy! If they’re dark, he’s darker! Anyone who comes will be drained dry, turning all enemies into cultivation resources for him, his wife, and his daughter on their path to immortality!

title: The End of a Fake Marriage
summary: When Miyagi, the head of a well-established Japanese restaurant, is confessed to by Kasuga, a chef-in-training visiting from a sister restaurant, the next day and every day after invites continuous sexual advances! Even as he struggles to resist Kasuga's proposals, what will happen as Miyagi becomes moved by Kasuga's unwavering attempts?!

title: When the Black Wolf Calls Me
summary:
"You can never have me. The one who can kill me, is me, not you."

Yeonwoo killed herself in front of her ex-husband who murdered her family. Yet, she found herself back again.

To escape from my ex-husband Hyojo's obsession, to protect my family and to protect myself... I ask another man to take me.

"Hwita, I'll be your woman!"

title: Black Fox: Sword Master Of Mount Kunlun
summary: A true Taoist’s martial arts exorcism record!  A mysterious organization seeks to unleash yokai upon the world, plunging it into chaos. While tracking them down, the master suddenly disappears.  Ten years later.  A lone Taoist practitioner, Tang Chan, encounters Jin Seorang, who is being pursued by dangerous men. Out of curiosity, Tang Chan decides to rescue Jin Seorang.  Amazed by Tang Chan’s martial prowess and Taoist arts, Jin Seorang seeks his help.  Jin Seorang’s enemy, Plum Moon Hall, is one of the infamous Seven Demon Clans, a sinister martial sect known for brainwashing people and turning them into yokai servants.  As Tang Chan helps Jin Seorang break Plum Moon Hakl’s dark magic, they discover that Plum Moon Hall’s leader knows the whereabouts of Tang Chan’s missing master.  Facing an unknown malevolence, Tang Chan realizes that Plum Moon Hall, the Seven Demon Clans, and an even greater force in the shadows are all tied to his master’s disappearance.  Even after all his master’s efforts, the world remains in turmoil. A young Taoist who follows the will of the heavens continues to wield his taoist arts, striving to restore balance to the world!
